card.name: AEtherize
card.text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

card.name: AEthersnatch
card.text: Gain control of target spell. You may choose new targets for it.

card.name: Acidic Slime
card.text: Deathtouch When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Act of Aggression
card.text: #_({PR} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)_# Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Ajani's Chosen
card.text: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, put a 2/2 white Cat creature token onto the battlefield. If that enchantment is an Aura, you may attach it to the token.

card.name: Altar's Reap
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Altar's Reap, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

card.name: Ambition's Cost
card.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Ancient Amphitheater
card.text: As Ancient Amphitheater enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Giant card from your hand. If you don't, Ancient Amphitheater enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Ancient Craving
card.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Angel of Serenity
card.text: Flying When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards. When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

card.name: Anya, Merciless Angel
card.text: Flying Anya, Merciless Angel gets +3/+3 for each opponent whose life total is less than half his or her starting life total. As long as an opponent's life total is less than half his or her starting life total, Anya has indestructible.

card.name: Arachnogenesis
card.text: Put X 1/2 green Spider creature tokens with reach onto the battlefield, where X is the number of creatures attacking you. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by non-Spider creatures.

card.name: Arbiter of Knollridge
card.text: Vigilance When Arbiter of Knollridge enters the battlefield, each player's life total becomes the highest life total among all players.

card.name: Arbor Colossus
card.text: Reach {3}{G}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 3. When Arbor Colossus becomes monstrous, destroy target creature with flying an opponent controls.

card.name: Arjun, the Shifting Flame
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Aura of Silence
card.text: Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast. Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Awaken the Sky Tyrant
card.text: When a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, sacrifice Awaken the Sky Tyrant. If you do, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Bane of Progress
card.text: When Bane of Progress enters the battlefield, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. Put a +1/+1 counter on Bane of Progress for each permanent destroyed this way.

card.name: Banishing Light
card.text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Beastmaster Ascension

card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. {1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

card.name: Biomantic Mastery
card.text: Draw a card for each creature target player controls, then draw a card for each creature another target player controls.

card.name: Black Market
